Generated Narrative: TestScript

Resource TestScript "testscript-example-update"

url: http://hl7.org/fhir/TestScript/testscript-example-update

identifier: id: urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.4.642.12.5

version: 1.0

name: TestScriptExampleUpdate

title: TestScript Example Update

status: draft

experimental: true

date: 2017-01-18

publisher: HL7

contact: Support: support@HL7.org

description: TestScript example resource with setup to delete if present and create a new instance of a Patient; and single test definition to update that Patient with various asserts.

jurisdiction: United States of America (the) (ISO 3166-1 Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions — Part 1: Country code#US)

purpose: Patient (Conditional) Create, Update, Delete Operations

copyright: © HL7.org 2011+

name: TestScriptExampleUpdate
title: TestScript Example Update
description: TestScript example resource with setup to delete if present and create a new instance of a Patient; and single test definition to update that Patient with various asserts.

link.description: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

operation.label: SetupDeletePatient
operation.description: Execute a delete operation to insure the patient does not exist on the server.

assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK) or 204(No Content).

operation.label: SetupCreatePatient
operation.description: Create patient resource on test server using the contents of fixture-patient-create

assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 201(Created).

test.name: Update Patient
test.description: Update a Patient and validate response.

operation.label: SetupUpdatePatient
operation.description: Update patient resource on test server using the contents of fixture-patient-update

assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is XML.
Confirm that the returned HTTP Header Last-Modified is present. Warning only as the server might not support versioning.
